description.value:
A deluge of necromantic power desiccates your target’s life force.

Necromantic energy rapidly washes over a creature of your choice that you can see within range, draining moisture and vitality from it. The target must make a CON save. It takes 8d8 necrotic damage on a failed save or half damage on a successful one. This spell has no effect on Undead or Constructs.

If you target a Plant creature or a magical plant, it makes the save with disadvantage, and the spell deals maximum damage to it. If you target a nonmagical plant that isn’t a creature, such as a tree or shrub, it withers and dies.

At Higher Rings. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th ring or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot beyond 4th ring.
